00008 const Double_t dxbin = (0.17-0.13)/40;   // Bin-width
00009 const Double_t sigma = 0.0012;
00010 
00011 //_____________________________________________________________________
00012 Double_t fdm5(Double_t *xx, Double_t *par)
00013 {
00014    Double_t x = xx[0];
00015    if (x <= 0.13957) return 0;
00016    Double_t xp3 = (x-par[3])*(x-par[3]);
00017    Double_t res = dxbin*(par[0]*TMath::Power(x-0.13957, par[1])
00018        + par[2] / 2.5066/par[4]*TMath::Exp(-xp3/2/par[4]/par[4]));
00019    return res;
00020 }
00021 
00022 //_____________________________________________________________________
00023 Double_t fdm2(Double_t *xx, Double_t *par)
00024 {
00025    Double_t x = xx[0];
00026    if (x <= 0.13957) return 0;
00027    Double_t xp3 = (x-0.1454)*(x-0.1454);
00028    Double_t res = dxbin*(par[0]*TMath::Power(x-0.13957, 0.25)
00029        + par[1] / 2.5066/sigma*TMath::Exp(-xp3/2/sigma/sigma));
00030    return res;
00031 }
